contact-us.subtitle: Through this form, you can send us your questions or comments by email. We are here to assist you and we will respond as soon as possible.
contact-us.subject: Subject

validations.email-already-exists: The entered email is already associated with another account.
validations.password-length: You need a minimum of 8 characters

success.user-registered: User registered successfully. You can now log in.
success.account-deleted: Your account has been successfully deleted
success.user-edited: Your profile has been successfully edited
success.password-email-sended: An email has been sent to your address, check your spam box.

errors.user-not-found: User not found. Please verify your credentials or register an account.
errors.user-not-edited: Your profile has not been edited successfully
errors.image-invalid: The selected file is not valid.
errors.password-not-edited-correctly: Could not edit the password correctly.
errors.password-email-not-sended: The email could not be sent, try again later

delete-modal.sure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete-modal.alert: This means that all your created pages and your information cannot be seen by anyone.

reset-password.enter-password: Enter the password you want to use from now on.
reset-password.instructions-to-send-email: In order to recover your password, tell us what your email is so we can send you the necessary instructions.

verify-page.we-need-to-know: We need to know it is you, click on the button so we can send you a verification email.
verify-page.desc-verified: Now you can access the platform and create the pages you want
